summary: Add a ton of food in inns.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS]"I'm just a cook, lass."
"We got rooms and food."
"Are you hungry ? Thirsty ? Both ?"
"Food for the Hungry, Drink for the Thirsty !"[/font][/center][font=Trebuchet MS]

Ever wondered why Inn have so little food available, as they serve everyday and everynight food and drinks for the people of skyrim ?
I did, and i added a lot a food stocks in Inns because ... No really ? Three potatoes and a bottle of Ale in the ONLY DAMNED INN IN SOLITUDE ?
Especially when you play with a lot of survival mods and immersion you realise that people of skyrim shoudl eat like ..ehm ... Half a potato per week to survive successfully with such an empty stock in Inns.

This mod is currently a short version of the mod a wanted to do but actually its because i dont know how to.
It should be compatible with everything that does not modifies Inns' LeveledList so ... Majority of mods.
I would appreciate every bit of information about what i did wrong !
I apologize for the poor quality of this mod, but im trying to make it better !

I added a version where salt is a non-alchemical ingredient and is considered as food because du to its mineral nature plus the heavy quantity available it should not (in my opinion) be an alchemical stuff.
Both versions are standalone.

Future updates (?) : 50+ DLs being enough persons for me to take time, I will do some patchs for added food by greats survivals mods if i found some which need it. [s]FOr now im going to make DLC-using versions.[/s][font=Trebuchet MS] [DONE][/font][s] [/s]I wont do any DragonBorn version because there is only Boarmeat and it cannot be cooked in the vanilla game so i find this worthless (but i will treat it if needed)

[center][b]THE HEARTFIRE VERSION IS UP[/b][/center]
[/font][center][font=Trebuchet MS]It would be great if you, fellow dragonborns, tell me what mod you use, so i can make patch for them.



[/font][/center][center][font=Trebuchet MS][b]
IMPORTANT : The 0.1 version modifies LeveledList that should NOT be modified, change ASAP for the 1.0 Version !

[b]IMPORTANT : Though fully compatible with Alternate Start - Live Another Life, It may cause a funny situation, because alternate start pick up in the Inn leveledList to give you your starting items. You now have a lot of food. Nice work.

IMPORTANT : I have an issue, i dont know how to randomize a bit the quantity to seems more immersive
if anyone have the solution i would be glad to know.
[/b]

[/b]
[/font][/center][font=Trebuchet MS]
Thank you.
[u]
EDIT:I had to remake the entire mod because i used a mod created by someone else as an example to know how to do, and i forgot to change the mod entirely ![/u]

[/font][center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b]DO NOT HESITATE TO TELL ME ANY ERROR OR MISSING CONTENT ! :)[/b][/size][/font][/center]
author: DouDaWitzki
